org.bonitasoft.engine.api
Interface PlatformLoginAPI

public interface PlatformLoginAPI

Manage the login on the platform

Using this API you can obtain a PlatformSession that can be used to retreive a PlatformAPIAccessor

Platform session allows to access only to platform APIs:

  • PlatformAPI
  • PlatformCommandAPI

Author:
Matthieu Chaffotte, Baptiste Mesta

Method Summary
 PlatformSession login(String userName, String password)
          Login with username and password of the platform administrator defined in bonita-platform.properties
 void logout(PlatformSession session)
          Logout from a platform.
 

Method Detail

login

PlatformSession login(String userName,
                      String password)
                      throws PlatformLoginException
Login with username and password of the platform administrator defined in bonita-platform.properties

Parameters:
userName - the platform administrator name
password - the platform administrator password
Returns:
the session created for you, can be used to retrieve platform APIs
Throws:
PlatformLoginException - occurs when an exception is thrown during login the platform

logout

void logout(PlatformSession session)
            throws PlatformLogoutException,
                   SessionNotFoundException
Logout from a platform.

Parameters:
the - platform session to logout from
Throws:
PlatformLogoutException - occurs when an exception is thrown during logout the platform
SessionNotFoundException - if the session is not found on the server side. This may occurs when the session has expired.
